sentences.en: Coma is a kind of emergency, and its difficult to establish a stable comatose animal model.
sentences.cn: 昏迷是一种急症, 建立稳定的昏迷模型较为困难.

sentences.en: Experts reckon that the market may remain comatose until at least the end of next year.
sentences.cn: 专家估计市场的麻木状态可能将持续到至少明年年底.

sentences.en: Grandpa lies comatose on the sofa.
sentences.cn: 爷爷躺在沙发上，睡得很沉。

sentences.en: He was comatose and had a severe fever and tachycardia.
sentences.cn: 他处于昏迷状态,伴高热和心动过速.

sentences.en: Hypothermia is appropriate for patients who comatose post - resuscitation.
sentences.cn: 处于昏迷的复苏后综合征病人,(控制性)低温是适宜的.

sentences.en: Sylvia: You know, back when she was comatose, the doctors almost donated away Liu's organs.
sentences.cn: 席薇雅: 你知道吗, 当初她昏迷时, 医生差点把刘小姐的器官捐出去了.

sentences.en: The doctors revived the comatose man.
sentences.cn: 这个医生使这个昏睡的苏醒了.

sentences.en: The method of temperature taking in comatose patients from groin or armpit is practical.
sentences.cn: 结论:对于昏迷病人体温测试时,可用腹股沟温代替腋温,临床操作具有实用性及可行性.

sentences.en: The patient's condition is very critical and he is in a comatose state.
sentences.cn: 病人的情况非常危急,他已经处于昏迷状态.

sentences.en: The right side of my brain had been so severely bruised that I was comatose for a month.
sentences.cn: 我右侧的大脑受了重创，以致我一个月都昏迷不醒。

sentences.en: Those in extreme fear can be put into a comatose type state.
sentences.cn: 那些极端恐惧的人可能会被安放进一种昏迷状态.

sentences.en: TK : I've revised a lot of poems into a comatose state.
sentences.cn: 我曾把许多诗修改成昏死状态.

words.tran_cn: [医]昏迷的；昏睡状态的；麻木的；怠惰的

trans.tran_cn: 昏迷的， 不省人事的，昏昏沉沉的， 昏昏欲睡的
